body_html:
I struggled a lot with the choice of API. Currently I found two implementations on Tensorflow and dpnn. Do you have any suggestions.

Ref:
NCE on tensorflow: https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/nn/nce_loss
NCE on dpnn: https://github.com/Element-Research/dpnn#nn.NCEModule

body:
I struggled a lot with the choice of API. Currently I found two implementations on `Tensorflow` and `dpnn`. Do you have any suggestions.

Ref:
NCE on tensorflow: https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/nn/nce_loss
NCE on dpnn: https://github.com/Element-Research/dpnn#nn.NCEModule
